description.value:
A Wearer who has the Pure Faith Talent may spend a fate point to automatically pass a single Test to resist Poison, Disease, or Radiation with 1d5 Degrees of Success.

Requirements

Kind of like a necklace or pendant.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: A Wearer who has the Pure Faith Talent may spend a fate point to automatically pass a single Test to resist Poison, Disease, or Radiation with 1d5 Degrees of Success.

system.effect: A Wearer who has the Pure Faith Talent may spend a fate point to automatically pass a single Test to resist Poison, Disease, or Radiation with 1d5 Degrees of Success.
